translations: 圆石铺砌；[纺] 织物重染

sentences.sentence: I don't see why a surgeon should spend very much time cobbling shoes.
sentences.translation: 我倒觉得一个外科大夫真犯不着花太多的时间去补鞋子。

sentences.sentence: I don't see why a surgeon should spend very much time cobbling shoes.
sentences.translation: 我倒觉得一个外科大夫真犯不著花太多的时间去补鞋子。

sentences.sentence: You can learn a tremendous amount by just giving yourself a project and cobbling through it to the end.
sentences.translation: 您只需要给自己设置一个项目，并从头到尾不断修修补补，这样就可以学习到大量的知识。
